name: snootily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is snooty (= unfriendly because you think you are better than other people): He was approached by a shop assistant who asked, snootily, if he could be of any assistance. The shop rather snootily refused to accept credit cards until a few years back. See
snooty
More examplesFewer examplesHe snootily refused the prestigious post of deputy mayor.The woman behind the counter informed me snootily that I would not find what I was looking for in her shop.The UK snootily declined to participate in the venture.
